Academy.name: 学院 Academy
Academy.publicNotes:
槽位 2；开销 52RP，12木材，6奢侈品，12石材
建造 学术（专家）DC27
升级自 图书馆
升级为 军事学院，大学
物品加值 创造性解决方案（Creative Solution）+2 物品加值
效果 当你位于一个建有学院的定居点内时，你在进行调查行动时的回忆知识的相关学识检定、进行研究时的检定、破译文书检定有+2物品加值。

Alchemy Laboratory.name: 炼金实验室 Alchemy Laboratory
Alchemy Laboratory.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 18RP，2矿石，5石材
建造 工业（受训）DC16
物品加值 拆除行动有+1物品加值
效果 在确定定居点内有哪些炼金物品可以出售时，定居点等级视为比实际等级高1级。此效果能叠加3次。当你在拥有至少一座炼金实验室的定居点内进行辨识炼金术时的检定有+1物品加值。

Arcanist's Tower.name: 奥术师塔 Arcanist's Tower
Arcanist's Tower.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 30RP，6矿石
建造 魔法（受训）DC20
物品加值 使用魔法技能进行减轻动荡行动时有+1物品加值
效果 在确定定居点内有哪些魔法物品可以出售时，定居点等级视为比实际等级高1级。此效果能叠加3次。当你在拥有奥术师塔的定居点内进行借阅奥术或学习法术时的检定有+1物品加值。

Bank.name: 银行 Bank
Bank.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 28RP，4矿石，6石材
建造 贸易（受训）DC20
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Tap Treasury
效果 The Capital Investment Leadership activity can be used only within the influence area of a settlement with a bank.

Barracks.name: 兵营 Barracks
Barracks.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 6RP，2木材，1石材
建造 防御DC16
升级为 驻地
物品加值 驻扎军队、恢复军队或征召军队有+1物品加值（详见附录3战争）
效果 兵营有助于招募军队，让士兵从战斗中恢复。当你在任意定居点中第一次建造兵营时，减少1点动荡。

Brewery.name: 酿酒厂 Brewery
Brewery.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 6RP，2木材
建造 农业DC15
物品加值 建立贸易协定有+1物品加值
效果 当你建造酿酒厂时，只要定居点当时的酿酒厂不超过4座，就可以减少1点动荡。

Bridge.name: 桥梁 Bridge
Bridge.publicNotes:
槽位 —；开销 6RP，1木材

建造 工程DC16

效果 桥梁允许岛屿定居点提供影响力，抵消岛屿定居点的贸易惩罚，并允许居民轻松穿过桥梁所在的水域边界。桥梁只能建造在水域边界上。当你建造桥梁时，请在城镇网格的其中一个水域边界中找到“桥梁”选框并打钩，以确定它所在的位置。

Castle.name: 城堡 Castle
Castle.publicNotes:
槽位 4；开销 54RP，12木材，12石材
建造 防御 （专家），工业（专家），魔法（专家）或权术（专家）DC26
升级自 市政厅
升级为 宫殿
物品加值 新任领导、效忠誓言、派遣外交使节有+2物品加值；驻扎军队、恢复军队或征召军队有+2物品加值
效果 当你在每个王国回合内首次建造城堡时，减少1d4点动荡。首都中的城堡能让PC领导在行动阶段每人执行3次领导行动，而不是最初的2次。

Cathedral.name: Cathedral
Cathedral.publicNotes:
槽位 4；开销 58RP，20木材，20石材
建造 Folklore (master)DC34
升级自 Temple
物品加值 +3 item bonus to Celebrate Holiday，Provide Care，and Repair Reputation (Corruption)
效果 The first time you build a cathedral in a turn，reduce Unrest by 4. While in a settlement with a cathedral，you gain a +3 item bonus to Lore and Religion checks made to Recall Knowledge while Investigating，and to all faith-themed checks made while Researching. Treat the settlement's level as three levels higher than its actual level for the purposes of determining what divine magic items are available for sale in that settlement. This effect does not stack with the similar effect granted by shrines or temples.

Dump.name: 垃圾场 Dump
Dump.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 4RP
建造 工业DC16
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Demolish
效果 Certain events have a more dangerous impact on settlements that don't include a dump. A dump can't be located in a block with any Residential structures.

Embassy.name: Embassy
Embassy.publicNotes:
槽位 2；开销 26RP，10木材，6奢侈品，4石材
建造 PoliticsDC24
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Send Diplomatic Envoy and Request Foreign Aid

Festival Hall.name: Festival Hall
Festival Hall.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 7RP，3木材
建造 Arts DC18
升级为 Theater
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Celebrate Holiday

Foundry.name: Foundry
Foundry.publicNotes:
槽位 2；开销 16RP，5木材，2矿石，3石材
建造 工业（受训）DC18
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Establish Work Site (mine)
效果 By processing ore in a foundry，your settlements grow more efficient at storing your kingdom's Commodities. Each foundry in your kingdom increases your maximum矿石 Commodity capacity by 1. A foundry cannot share a block with a Residential structure.

Garrison.name: Garrison
Garrison.publicNotes:
槽位 2；开销 28RP，6木材，3石材
建造 战争（受训）DC20
升级自 Barracks
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Outfit Army or Train Army (see Appendix 3: Warfare)
效果 A garrison helps outfit armies with new gear or trains them. When you build a garrison，reduce Unrest by 1.

Granary.name: Granary
Granary.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 12RP，2木材
建造 AgricultureDC15
效果 Each granary in your kingdom increases your maximum Food Commodity capacity by 1.

Herbalist.name: Herbalist
Herbalist.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 10RP，1木材
建造 WildernessDC15
升级为 Hospital
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Provide Care

Hospital.name: Hospital
Hospital.publicNotes:
槽位 2；开销 30RP，10木材，6石材
建造 防御 （专家）DC26
升级自 Herbalist
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Provide Care and Quell Unrest
效果 While in a settlement with a hospital，you gain a +2 item bonus to Medicine checks to Treat Wounds and Treat Wounds.

Houses.name: Houses
Houses.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 3RP，1木材
建造 工业DC15
升级自 Tenement
Upgrade To Mansion，Orphanage
效果 The first time you build houses each Kingdom turn，reduce Unrest by 1.

Inn.name: Inn
Inn.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 10RP，2木材
建造 TradeDC15
物品加值 +1 Item bonus to Hire Adventurers

Jail.name: Jail
Jail.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 14RP，4木材，2矿石，4石材
建造 防御 DC16
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Quell Unrest using Intrigue
效果 The first time you build a jail each a Kingdom turn，reduce Crime by 1.

Keep.name: Keep
Keep.publicNotes:
槽位 2；开销 32RP，8木材，8石材
建造 防御 （受训）DC18
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Deploy Army，Garrison Army或Train Army (see Appendix 3: Warfare)
效果 The first time you build a keep each Kingdom turn，reduce Unrest by 1.

Lumberyard.name: Lumberyard
Lumberyard.publicNotes:
槽位 2；开销 16RP，5木材，1矿石
建造 工业（受训）DC18
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Establish Work Site (lumber camp)
效果 Each lumberyard in your kingdom increases maximum木材 Commodity capacity by 1. A lumberyard must be built in a lot next to a Water border，both to give the yard a source of power to run saws to process timber，but more importantly to facilitate the shipment of trees to the yard.

Luxury Store.name: Luxury Store
Luxury Store.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 28RP，10木材，6奢侈品
建造 Trade （专家）DC22
升级自 General Store
升级为 魔法Shop
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Establish 贸易Agreement
效果 A luxury store must be built on a block that has either a mansion or a noble villa. Treat the settlement's level as one level higher than its actual level for determining what luxury-themed magic items (subject to GM approval) are readily available for sale in that settlement. This effect stacks up to three times and overlaps with other stores that function in this way for more specific categories of magic items.

Magic Shop.name: Magic Shop
Magic Shop.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 44RP，8木材，6奢侈品，6石材
建造 魔法（专家）DC24
升级自 Luxury Store
升级为 Occult Shop
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Supernatural Solution
效果 Treat the settlement's level as one level higher than its actual level for the purposes of determining what magic items are readily available for sale in that settlement. This effect stacks up to three times and overlaps with other stores that function in this way for more specific categories of magic items.

Mansion.name: Mansion
Mansion.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 10RP，6木材，6奢侈品，3石材
Construction 工业（受训）DC20
升级自 Houses
升级为 Noble Villa
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Improve Lifestyle

Menagerie.name: Menagerie
Menagerie.publicNotes:
槽位 4；开销 26RP，14木材，10矿石，10石材
建造 Wilderness （专家）DC30
升级自 Park
物品加值 +2 item bonus to Rest and Relax using Wilderness
效果 A menagerie typically contains a selection of level 5 or lower animals. If your party captures a living creature of level 6 or higher and can transport the creature back to a settlement with a menagerie，you can add that creature to the menagerie as long as your kingdom level is at least 4 higher than the creature's level. Each time such a creature is added to a menagerie，gain 1 Fame or Infamy point (as appropriate) or reduce one Ruin of your choice by 1.
Only creatures with Intelligence modifiers of –4 or –5 are appropriate to place in a menagerie. A kingdom gains 1 Unrest at the start of a Kingdom turn for each sapient creature (anything with an Intelligence modifier of –3 or higher) on display in a menagerie.

Mill.name: Mill
Mill.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 6RP，2木材，1石材
建造 工业（受训）DC16
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Harvest Crops
效果 If a settlement includes at least one mill built on a lot adjacent to a Water border，the increased efficiency of these mills reduces the settlement's Consumption by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

Mint.name: 铸币厂 Mint
Mint.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 30RP，12木材，20矿石，16石材
建造 贸易(master)DC34
物品加值 +3 item bonus to Capital Investment，Collect Taxes，and to Repair Reputation (Crime)

Monument.name: 纪念碑 Monument
Monument.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 6RP，1石材
建造 Arts （受训）DC18
Effect The first time you build a monument each Kingdom turn，reduce Unrest by 1 and reduce one Ruin of your choice by 1.

Museum.name: Museum
Museum.publicNotes:
槽位 2；开销 30RP，6木材，2石材
建造 Exploration （受训）DC20
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Rest and Relax using Arts
效果 A magic item of level 6 or higher that has a particular import or bears significant historical or regional value (at the GM's discretion) can be donated to a museum. Each time such an item is donated，reduce Unrest by 1. If that item is later removed from display，increase Unrest by 1.

Noble Villa.name: Noble Villa
Noble Villa.publicNotes:
槽位 2；开销 24RP，10木材，6奢侈品，8石材
建造 Politics （专家）DC19
升级自 Mansion
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Improve Lifestyle and to Quell Unrest using Politics
效果 The first time you build a noble villa each Kingdom turn，reduce Unrest by 2.

Occult Shop.name: Occult Shop
Occult Shop.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 38RP，12木材，12奢侈品，6石材
建造 魔法(master)DC32
升级自 魔法Shop
物品加值 +2 item bonus to Prognostication
效果 Treat the settlement's level as one level higher than its actual level for the purposes of determining what occult magic items are readily available for sale in that settlement. This effect stacks up to three times and overlaps with other stores that function in this way for more specific categories of magic items. While in a settlement with an occult shop，you gain a +2 item bonus to all checks made to Research esoteric subjects or to Recall Knowledge about the same.

Orphanage.name: Orphanage
Orphanage.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 6RP，2木材
建造 工业DC16
升级自 Houses
效果 The first time you build an orphanage each Kingdom turn，reduce Unrest by 1.

Palace.name: Palace
Palace.publicNotes:
槽位 4；开销 108RP，20木材，12奢侈品，15矿石，20石材
建造 防御 (master)，工业(master)，魔法(master)或权术(master)DC34
Upgrade From Castle
物品加值 +3 item bonus to New Leadership，Pledge of Fealty，and Send Diplomatic Envoy，and +3 item bonus to Garrison Army，Recover Army或Recruit Army (see Appendix 3: Warfare)
效果 A palace can only be built in your capital. The first time you build a palace，reduce Unrest by 10.
If you Relocate your Capital，a palace left behind in that capital instead functions as a noble villa that takes up 4 lots. (If you represent this by placing two noble villas in these lots，make sure to note that they constitute a single building and aren't two separate structures.)
A palace in a capital allows PC leaders to take 3 Leadership activities during the Activity phase of a Kingdom turn rather than just 2. In addition，once your kingdom has a palace，a PC in the Ruler leadership role gains a +3 item bonus to checks made to resolve Leadership activities.

Park.name: 公园 Park
Park.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 5RP
建造 WildernessDC18
升级为 Menageie
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Rest and Relax using Wilderness checks
效果 The first time you build a park each Kingdom turn，reduce Unrest by 1.

Paved Streets.name: Paved Streets
Paved Streets.publicNotes:
槽位 —；开销 12RP，6石材
建造 工业（受训）DC19
效果 It takes a character only 5 minutes to move from one lot to an adjacent lot in an Urban Grid when moving on paved streets. When you build paved streets，check the paved streets checkbox on your Urban Grid.

Pier.name: Pier
Pier.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 16RP，2木材
建造 Boating DC18
升级为 Waterfront
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Go Fishing
效果 A pier must be built in a lot next to a Water border.

Printing House.name: Printing House
Printing House.publicNotes:
槽位 2；开销 48RP，14木材，12奢侈品
建造 工业(master)DC27
物品加值 +2 item bonus to Improve Lifestyle and Quell Unrest
效果 A PC in a settlement with a printing house gains a +2 item bonus to checks to Gather Information or to Research any topic in a library or similar structure.

Sacred Grove.name: Sacred Grove
Sacred Grove.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 36RP
建造 Wilderness （受训）DC20
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Quell Unrest using Folklore
效果 Treat the settlement's level as one level higher than its actual level for the purposes of determining what primal magic items are readily available for sale in that settlement. This effect stacks up to three times.

Secure Warehouse.name: Secure Warehouse
Secure Warehouse.publicNotes:
槽位 2；开销 24RP，6木材，4矿石，6石材
建造 工业（专家）DC22
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Craft奢侈品
效果 Each secure warehouse in your kingdom increases your maximum奢侈品 Commodity capacity by 1.

Sewer System.name: Sewer System
Sewer System.publicNotes:
槽位 —；开销 24RP，8木材，8石材
建造 工程 （专家）DC23
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Clandestine Business
效果 A sewer system reduces the settlement's Consumption by 1. Having a sewer system can also affect certain kingdom events. When you build a sewer system，check the sewer system checkbox on its Urban Grid. (For metropolises，this infrastructure automatically applies to all of its Urban Grids.)

Shrine.name: Shrine
Shrine.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 8RP，2木材，1石材
建造 Folklore （受训）DC15
升级为 Temple
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Celebrate Holiday
效果 Treat the settlement's level as one level higher than its actual level when determining what divine magic items are readily available for sale in that settlement. This effect stacks up to three times but does not stack with the same effect granted by temples or cathedrals.

Smithy.name: Smithy
Smithy.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 8RP，2木材，1矿石，1石材
建造 工业（受训）DC18
物品加值 +1 item bonus to 贸易Commodities，+1 item bonus to Outfit Army (see Appendix 3: Warfare)
效果 While in a settlement with a smithy，you gain a +1 item bonus to Craft checks made to work with metal.

Stable.name: Stable
Stable.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 10RP，2木材
建造 Wilderness （受训）DC18
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Establish 贸易Agreement

Stockyard.name: Stockyard
Stockyard.publicNotes:
槽位 4；开销 20RP，4木材
建造 工业DC18
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Gather Lifestock
效果 A settlement with at least one stockyard reduces its Consumption by 1.

Stonemason.name: Stonemason
Stonemason.publicNotes:
槽位 2；开销 16RP，2木材
建造 工业（受训）DC18
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Establish Work Site (quarry).
效果 Each stonemason in your kingdom increases your maximum石材 Commodity capacity by 1.

Tannery.name: Tannery
Tannery.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 6RP，2木材
建造 工业（受训）DC18
物品加值 +1 to 贸易Commodities
效果 A tannery cannot share a block with any Residential structure except tenements.

Tavern, Dive.name: Tavern, Dive
Tavern, Dive.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 12RP，1木材
建造 贸易（受训）DC15
Upgrade To Tavern，Popular
效果 The first time you build a dive tavern in a Kingdom turn，reduce Unrest by 1 but increase Crime by 1.

Tavern, Luxury.name: Tavern, Luxury
Tavern, Luxury.publicNotes:
槽位 2；开销 48RP，10木材，8奢侈品，8石材
建造 贸易(master)DC26
升级自 Tavern，Popular
升级为 Tavern，World-Class
物品加值 +2 item bonus to Hire Adventurers and to Rest and Relax using Trade
效果 The first time you build a luxury tavern in a Kingdom turn，reduce Unrest by 1d4+1. If attempt a Performance check to Earn Income in a settlement with a luxury tavern，you gain a +2 item bonus to the check. All checks made to Gather Information in a settlement with at least one luxury tavern gain a +2 item bonus.

Tavern, Popular.name: Tavern, Popular
Tavern, Popular.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 24RP，6木材，2石材
建造 贸易（专家）DC18
升级自 Tavern，Dive
升级为 Tavern，Luxury
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Hire Adventurers and to Rest and Relax using Trade
效果 The first time you build a popular tavern in a Kingdom turn，reduce Unrest by 2. If you attempt a Performance check to Earn Income in a settlement with a popular tavern，you gain a +1 item bonus to the check. All checks made to Gather Information in a settlement with at least one popular tavern gain a +1 item bonus.

Temple.name: Temple
Temple.publicNotes:
槽位 2；开销 32RP，6木材，6石材
建造 Folklore （受训）DC23
升级自 Shrine
升级为 Cathedral
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Celebrate Holiday and Provide Care
效果 The first time you build a temple each Kingdom turn，reduce Unrest by 2. Treat the settlement's level as one level higher than its actual level for the purposes of determining what divine magic items are readily available for sale in that settlement. This effect stacks up to three times but does not stack with the same effect granted by shrines or cathedrals.

Tenement.name: Tenement
Tenement.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 1RP，1木材
建造 工业DC14
升级为 Houses
Ruin +1 to a Ruin of your choice
效果 The first time you build tenements each Kingdom turn，reduce Unrest by 1.

Theater.name: Theater
Theater.publicNotes:
槽位 2；开销 24RP，8木材，3石材
建造 Arts （专家）DC26
升级自 Festival Hall
Upgrade To Opera House
物品加值 +2 item bonus to Celebrate Holiday.
效果 The first time you build a theater each Kingdom turn，reduce Unrest by 1. While in a settlement with a theater，you gain a +2 item bonus to Performance checks made to Earn Income.

Thieves' Guild.name: Thieves' Guild
Thieves' Guild.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 25RP，4木材
建造 Intrigue （受训）DC20
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Infiltration
Ruin +1 Crime
效果 While in a settlement with a thieves' guild，you gain a +1 item bonus to Create Forgeries.

Arena.name: 竞技场 Arena
Arena.publicNotes:
槽位 4；开销 40RP，6木材，12石材
建造 战争（专家）DC26
物品加值 庆祝节日行动、使用战争技能进行减轻动荡行动有+1物品加值
效果 竞技场可以让你在定居点能更有效率地重训战斗系专长；这样只需要5天而非一周的休整期时间。

Construction Yard.name: Construction Yard
Construction Yard.publicNotes:
槽位 4；开销 40RP，10木材，10石材
建造 工程DC27
物品加值 +1 item bonus to Build Structure and to Repair Reputation (Decay)

General Store.name: General Store
General Store.publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 8RP，1木材
建造 TradeDC15
Upgrade To Luxury Store，Marketplace
效果 A settlement without a general store or marketplace reduces its effective level for the purposes of determining what items can be purchased there by 2.

Gladiatorial Arena.name: Gladiatorial Arena
Gladiatorial Arena.publicNotes:
槽位 4；开销 58RP，10木材，30石材
建造 战争(master)DC34
Upgrade From arena
物品加值 +3 item bonus to Celebrate Holiday，to Hire Adventurers，and to 战争checks made in order to Quell Unrest
效果 A gladiatorial arena allows a PC in the settlement to retrain combat-themed feats (at the GM’s discretion) more efficiently；doing so takes only 4 days rather than a week of downtime.

University.name: University
University.publicNotes:
槽位 4；开销 78RP，18木材，18奢侈品，18石材
建造 学术(master)DC34
升级自 Academy
物品加值 +3 item bonus to Creative Solution
效果 While in a settlement with a university，you gain a +3 item bonus to Lore checks made to Recall Knowledge while Investigating，to Research checks (Gamemastery Guide 154)，and to Decipher Writing.

Wall, Stone.name: Wall, Stone
Wall, Stone.publicNotes:
槽位 —；开销 4RP，8石材
建造 防御 （受训）DC20
升级自 Wall，Wooden
效果 A stone wall is built along the border of your settlement. The first time you build a stone wall in each settlement，reduce Unrest by 1. When you build a stone wall，choose a border on your Urban Grid and check the appropriate checkbox；if you're upgrading from a wooden wall，uncheck that box.

Wall, Wooden.name: Wall, Wooden
Wall, Wooden.publicNotes:
槽位 —；开销 2RP，4木材
建造 防御 DC15
升级为 Wall，Stone

For Structures with the Residential trait，the limit is increased by three instead. For Structures with the Edifice trait，the limit is only increased by one，not two. If using a Palace’s ability to construct a Structure in a different Settlement，theRP limit for the Palace’s Settlement is used.

Castle (V&K).name: 城堡（V&K） Castle (V&K)
Castle (V&K).publicNotes:
槽位 4；开销 54RP，12木材，12石材
建造 防御 （专家），工业（专家），魔法（专家）或权术（专家）DC26
升级自 市政厅
升级为 宫殿
物品加值 新任领导、效忠誓言、派遣外交使节、管理贸易协定、迁都有+2物品加值；驻扎军队、恢复军队、征召军队或重训有+2物品加值
效果 当你在每个王国回合内首次建造城堡时，减少1d4点动荡。首都中的城堡能让PC领导在行动阶段每人执行3次领导行动，而不是最初的2次。

拥有城堡的定居点每回合获得两次定居点行动，并将该定居点每回合可进行的公民活动数量上限从一次提升至三次。

如果在一个回合内，该定居点进行了三次建造结构活动（无论使用定居点行动还是领袖行动），则其中至少有一次必须用于建造具有"基础设施"特性的建筑。

当定居点达到城镇规模时，每回合可生产一枚资源骰。若发展为城市规模，则提升至每回合两枚资源骰。若成长为都会规模，将增加至每回合三枚资源骰。这些资源骰是城市或都会本身自带的资源骰之外的额外产出。

Occult Shop (V&K).name: Occult Shop (V&K)
Occult Shop (V&K).publicNotes:
槽位 1；开销 38RP，12木材，12奢侈品，6石材
建造 魔法(master)DC32
升级自 魔法Shop
物品加值 +2 item bonus to Prognostication and Supernatural Solution
效果 Treat the settlement's level as one level higher than its actual level for the purposes of determining what occult magic items are readily available for sale in that settlement. This effect stacks up to three times and overlaps with other stores that function in this way for more specific categories of magic items. While in a settlement with an occult shop，you gain a +2 item bonus to all checks made to Research esoteric subjects or to Recall Knowledge about the same.

Palace (V&K).name: Palace (V&K)
Palace (V&K).publicNotes:
槽位 4；开销 108RP，20木材，12奢侈品，15矿石，20石材
建造 防御 (master)，工业(master)，魔法(master)或权术(master)DC34
Upgrade From Castle
物品加值 +3 item bonus to New Leadership，Pledge of Fealty，and Send Diplomatic Envoy，Manage 贸易Agreements，Relocate Capital，and +3 item bonus to Garrison Army，Recover Army或Recruit Army，and Retrain
效果 A palace can only be built in your capital. The first time you build a palace，reduce Unrest by 10.
If you Relocate your Capital，a palace left behind in that capital instead functions as a noble villa that takes up 4 lots. (If you represent this by placing two noble villas in these lots，make sure to note that they constitute a single building and aren't two separate structures.)
A palace in a capital allows PC leaders to take 3 Leadership activities during the Activity phase of a Kingdom turn rather than just 2. In addition，once your kingdom has a palace，a PC in the Ruler leadership role gains a +3 item bonus to checks made to resolve Leadership activities.

A Settlement with a Palace gains two Settlement Actions per Turn and increases the limit on Civic Activities per Turn in that Settlement from one to three.

If a Leader uses a Build Structure activity in the Settlement with the Palace on their Turn，the Build Structure activity may instead be used to build a Structure in any other Settlement，ignoring the other Settlement's limit on Civic Activities per Turn. This build instead counts against the Palace's Settlement's limit on Civic Activities per Turn，and the Palace's Settlement's Item Bonus is used for the roll.

If a Leader uses Build a Structure to build in another settlement on their Turn and two Build Structure activities are taken within the Palace's Settlement that Turn，at least one of the two must be used to construct a Structure with the Infrastructure trait.

If three Build Structure activities are taken within the Palace's Settlement in a Turn (whether using the Settlement's actions or a Leader's action)，at least one of the three must be used to construct a Structure with the Infrastructure trait.

If the Settlement has reached Town size，it produces one Resource Die per Turn. If it has reached City size，this increases to two RD per Turn. If it has reached Metropolis size，this increases to four RD per Turn. These Resource Dice are in addition to the one Resource Die a City or Metropolis generates by itself.

Only the Kingdom's Capital may build or have a Palace. If a non-Capital Settlement somehow has a Palace，replace the Palace with a Castle (not two Noble Villas as specified in the text of the Palace Structure). If the Kingdom later uses Relocate Capital to move the Capital to this Settlement，replace the Castle in this Settlement with a Palace.

A Settlement with a Town Hall gains one Settlement action per Turn and increases the limit on Civic Activities per Turn in that Settlement from one to two.

Fishing Fleets.name: Fishing Fleets
Fishing Fleets.publicNotes:
Lots -；Cost 10RP，2木材
Construction Boating （专家）DC20，Pier or Waterfront，Settlement must have a hex containing a large body of water within its influence
Item Bonus +1 item bonus to Go Fishing and Rest and Relax using Boa
Effects A Fishing Fleet reduces the Consumption of its Settlement by one. A Settlement may normally have only one Fishing Fleet. If the Kingdom has Master Boating and the Settlement has both a Waterfront and a second hex containing a large body of water within its Influence，it may build a second Fishing fleet. If the Kingdom has Legendary Boating and the Settlement has both a Waterfront and a third hex containing a large body of water within its Influence，it may build a third Fishing fleet. An individual hex may only count towards one Settlement for the purpose of Fishing Fleets.
